title: Anbe Anbe Kolladhe Lyrics Jeans
stanzas:
anbe anbe kolladhe..
kanne kannai killaadhe..
penne punnagaiyil
idhayathai vedikaadhe
aiyo unnasaivil uyirai kudikaadhe

penne unadhu mellidai paarthen
adadaa brahman kanjanadi
sattre nimirndhen thalai suttri ponen
aahaa avane vallaladi..

minnalai pidithu thoorigai samaithu
ravivarman ezhuthiya vathanamadi
nooradi padhukkai
aaradi aakki
sirpigal sethukkiya uruvamadi

ithuvarai mannil pirandha pennil
neethaan neethaan azhagiyadi
ithanai azhagum motham serthu
ennai vadaippathu kodumaiyadi

koduthu vaitha poove poove
aval koondhal manam solvaayaa
koduthu vaitha nathiye nathiye
aval kulitha sugam solvaayaa
koduthu vaitha koluse
kaalalavai solvaayaa
koduthu vaitha maniye
maarazhagai solvaayaa

azhagiya nilavil oxygen nirappi
ange unakkoru veedu seiven
unnuyir kaakka ennuyir kondu
uyirukku uyiraai thunai iruppaen

megathai pidithu methaigal amaithu
melliya poo unnai thoonga vaippen
thookkathil maarbil verkkindra pothu
natchathiram kondu naan thudaippen

paal vanna paravai kulippatharkaaga
panithuli ellaam segaripen
devathai kulitha thuligalai alli
theertham endrae naan kudippen

anbe anbe kolladhe..
kanne kannai killaadhe..
penne punnagaiyil
idhayathai vedikaadhe
aiyo unnasaivil uyirai kudikaadhe
